description: 2-part of number of tournaments on n nodes.
references: Steven C. Cater and Robert W. Robinson, ``Exponents of 2 in the numbers of unlabeled graphs and tournaments,'' Congressus Numerantium, 82 (1991), pp. 139-155.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Index entries for sequences related to tournaments
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
